message.body: It was pretty fun. Everyone brought some food and we all played games. Midnight came really quick, we all almost forgot. That's usually the case with us.
Hahahah. I was looking forward to counting down. Sounds like you had a good time :)
Do you know what a lightning cable is for?
Lighting cable is the new charger for the iPhones.
Why don't they just call them chargers?
Hahaha. Of course. What do you have planned for the night?
I'm at my sister's. I put both of the babies to sleep :))))
Have to go home later and do laundry and Other stuff around the house. Then I have to get working on a costume for a party I have tomorrow.
You're a regular mommy now aren't cha! Lol. What kind of costume party?
I'm going to dinner with some friends before they leave.

Hellz no! Not even close. You should have a talk with my sister if you want to know the real mommy experience hahah. My friends (who are twins) are having a KE$HA GLITTER ENCHANTED UNICORN birthday party. So I'm trying to be whimsical with my outfit. Right now, it just looks kind of too slutty for me hahah. Oh where are your friends going?
DnB. Dinner and play a little bit.
